# [Interview #977: Cosmere Q&A - 17th Shard, Entry #192](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=977#192)

#### Kurkistan

Was it Shallan's brother, by the way?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO

#### Footnote

Kurkistan is referring to the Shardbearer who Kaladin killed.
